ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader simulates Stars.
Setup:
- Density : density of the stars - Seed: seed value for stars pattern - Speed: flickering speed - Brightness : brightness of the stars
Demo clip: http://vimeo.com/82460176
Shader developer: Kali Based on https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MssGzM This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.
Matchbox version by ivar@inferno-op.com (Originally known as crok stars)
ShaderNodePreset.Name: Stars
